TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit InvalidTemporaryStorageStreamException extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException

Docs.summary: Occurs when a temporary stream does not support seeking, reading, or writing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Please see [Web.config Settings for ReportViewer](../Topic/Web.config%20Settings%20for%20ReportViewer.md) for more information.
